languages.text: "Вы знакомы с трудами инквизитора Аластара Искупителя? Не каждый аколит может гордиться подобным, не говоря уже о... менее посвященных". {n}Хейнрикс приподнимает бровь, внимательно изучая вышитый герб на одеяниях Кассии.{/n} "Простите мои манеры, Леди-Навигатор Орселлио. Большая честь".

"You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."
languages.original_text: "Вы знакомы с трудами инквизитора Аластара Искупителя? It is a great honour."

languages.text: "Ihr seid vertraut mit den Werken von Inquisitor Alastar dem Erlöser? Nicht alle Akolythen können das behaupten, ganz zu schweigen von ... Personen mit weniger Einblick." {n}Heinrix hebt eine Augenbraue und untersucht das Wappen auf Cassias Kleidung.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine schlechten Manieren, Lady Navigator Orsellio. Es ist mir eine große Ehre."
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

"Ihr seid vertraut mit den Werken von Inquisitor Alastar dem Erlöser? Nicht alle Akolythen können das behaupten, ganz zu schweigen von Personen ... mit weniger Einblick." {n}Heinrix hebt eine Augenbraue und untersucht das Wappen auf Cassias Kleidung.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine schlechten Manieren, Lady Navigator Orsellio. Es ist mir eine große Ehre."

languages.text: « Vous connaissez l'œuvre de l'inquisiteur Alastar le Rédempteur ? Tous les acolytes ne peuvent pas en dire autant, et encore moins les non-initiés. » {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil en examinant les armoiries sur la tenue de Cassia.{/n} « Veuillez pardonner mon impolitesse, dame navigatrice Orsellio. C'est un grand honneur. »
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: « Vous connaissez l'œuvre de l'inquisiteur Alastar le Rédempteur ? Tous les acolytes ne peuvent pas en dire autant, et encore moins les non-initiés. » {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil en examinant les armoiries sur la tenue de Cassia.{/n} « Veuillez pardonner mon impolitesse, dame navigatrice Orsellio. C'est un grand honneur. »

languages.text: “你似乎很熟悉救赎者阿拉斯塔审判官的作品，是吗？就连审判庭的侍仆都做不到这一点，更不用提……外部人员了。”{n}海因里希扬起了眉毛，仔细观察着卡西娅衣服上的纹章。{/n}“请原谅我的失礼，导航者奥赛罗女士。能见到你是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: “你似乎很熟悉救赎者阿拉斯塔审判官的作品，是吗？就连审判庭的侍仆都做不到这一点，更不用提……外部人员了。”{n}海因里希扬起了眉毛，仔细观察着卡西娅衣服上的纹章。{/n}“请原谅我的失礼，导航者奥塞罗女士。能见到你是我的荣幸。”
“你似乎很熟悉救赎者阿拉斯塔审判官的作品，是吗？就连审判庭的侍仆都做不到这一点，更不用提……外部人员了。”{n}海因里希扬起了眉毛，仔细观察着卡西娅衣服上的纹章。{/n}“请原谅我的失礼，导航者奥赛罗女士。能见到你是我的荣幸。”

languages.text: 「解放者インクィジター・アラスターの作品に詳しいのですか？すべてのアコライトがそう言えるわけではないでしょうね…教えに乏しい者たちは言うまでもなく」{n}ハインリックスは眉を吊り上げ、カシアの衣服の紋章を調べる。{/n}「マナーがなっておらず申し訳ありません、オーステリオの航宙士様。身に余る光栄です」
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: 「解放者インクィジター・アラスターの作品に詳しいのですか？すべてのアコライトがそう言えるわけではないでしょうね…教えに乏しい者たちは言うまでもなく」{n}ハインリックスは眉を吊り上げ、カシアの衣服の紋章を調べる。{/n}「マナーがなっておらず申し訳ない、オーステリオの航宙士様。大いに光栄だ」

languages.text: «¿Está familiarizada con las obras del inquisidor Alastar el Redentor? No todos los acólitos pueden decir lo mismo, por no hablar de la gente con menos experiencia». {n}Heinrix arquea una ceja, examinando el escudo de armas del atuendo de Cassia.{/n} «Disculpe mi falta de modales, Lady Navegante Orsellio. Es un gran honor».
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

traits.locale_text: «¿Está familiarizada con las obras del inquisidor Alastar el Redentor? No todos los acólitos pueden decir lo mismo, por no hablar de la gente... con menos experiencia». {n}Heinrix arquea una ceja, examinando el escudo de armas del atuendo de Cassia.{/n} «Disculpe mi falta de modales, Lady Navegante Orsellio. Es un gran honor».

languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."

languages.text: "Engizisyonculardan Kurtarıcı Alastar'ın eserlerine aşinasınız demek. Benim diyen havarilerde bile az rastlanırken daha... Eğitimsizlerden bunu duymak...{n}" Heinrix tek kaşını kaldırıyor ve Cassia'nın kıyafetlerindeki armayı inceliyor.{/n} "Lütfen görgüsüzlüğümü bağışlayın Leydi Rotacı Orsellio. Büyük şeref duydum."
languages.original_text: "You are familiar with the works of Inquisitor Alastar the Redeemer? Not every acolyte can say the same, let alone... people less initiated." {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, examining the coat of arms on Cassia's clothes.{/n} "Please forgive my lapse in manners, Lady Navigator Orsellio. It is a great honour."
